author: felicity
msg: bug 1800: messages with large positive scores (if they hit GTUBE at 1000
points for instance), can have a X-Spam-Level header with more than the
RFC allowed number of chars.  so we now limit X-Spam-Level to show a max
score of 100.  that makes it obvious the message is really spam while
